alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lapeer and east central Genesee Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hadley, or 7 miles southeast of Davison, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Metamora around 625 PM EDT. Lapeer around 630 PM EDT. Imlay City and Lum around 645 PM EDT. Brown City around 700 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Atlas, Goodland Township, Burnside, Attica, Elba, Kings Mill and Thornville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
